lead_paragraph: With myriad colors and designs — more than 31,000 in New York — racing silks help thoroughbred fans keep track of the horses.
snippet: With myriad colors and designs — more than 31,000 in New York — racing silks help thoroughbred fans keep track of the horses.

headline.print_headline: Any Color You Need, Provided You Wear a Small
headline.main: Racing Silks in Every Color, Provided You Wear a Small
headline.seo: Racing Silks in Every Color, Provided You Wear a Small
headline.sub: Belmont Park’s Color Room holds thousands of racing silks. No two are the same, but all go nicely with white pants and a brown coat.;
